data.text: @EU_Commission @Europarl_EN @JunckerEU @jyrkikatainen @A_Breidthardt @ONUinfo #Brexit All #UnitedNations member countries now know that  #UnitedKingdom does not respect any treaty or other agreement.

@EU_Commission @ChrisHazzardSF @MichelBarnier A no-deal scenario, should be executed immediately! Full sanctioning of all no-deal resolutions should be postulated fully and immediately!  The uk government's contriving conceptualisation of brexit, is an unrealistic derogatory insult, towards all EU member state's!

@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Clarification you require:  No Deal..No Money.

@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier So does that mean no further @EU_Commission @MichelBarnier 'compromise' then, leading logically to the EU forcing a 'no deal' ? Just curious and seeking clarification. Asking for a friend @guyverhofstadt @JunckerEU
